linkPreview: This link will take you to {url}.</br> Be careful, this link could be malicious. Are you sure you want to continue?
privacy: All votes will be encrypted until the voting period has ended and the final score is calculated
resultsError: Results could not be calculated. This is often due to a misconfigured strategy or an unresponsive RPC node involved in the strategy.
resultsCalculating: Final results are being calculated. If you still see this message after a few minutes contact the space admin.
noVotingPower: Oops, it seems you don't have any voting power at performance {performanceName}.
warningFlaggedProposal: This proposal might contain scams, offensive material, or be malicious in nature. Please proceed with caution.
warningFlaggedSpace: This space might contain scams, offensive material, or be malicious in nature. Please proceed with caution.
noResultsFound: Oops, we can't find any results
votingPowerFailedMessage: Your voting power could not be calculated. This is often due to a misconfigured strategy or an unresponsive RPC node involved in the strategy. If the problem persists, consider contacting our support team on {help}
votingValidationFailedMessage: We were not able to validate your eligibility to vote. This is often due to a misconfigured vote validation setting or an unresponsive RPC node. If the problem persists, consider contacting our support team on {help}

wrong timestamp.title: Wrong timestamp
wrong timestamp.message: The message timestamp is not valid. Please check the clock on your device, make sure it is set to the correct date and time and try again.

space with ticket requires voting valida.title: Missing voting validation
space with ticket requires voting valida.message: Your proposal cannot be submitted due to a missing voting validation rule required with the 'ticket' strategy. Please adjust your settings by either using another strategy or adding the required validation.

space missing proposal validation.title: Missing proposal validation
space missing proposal validation.message: Your proposal cannot be submitted due to a missing proposal validation rule. To prevent unauthorized proposals and spam, add a validation rule in your space settings.

type.label: Type
type.information: The type of voting system used for this space. (Enforced on all future proposals)

create.delayEnforced: The space enforces a delay until voting can start
create.periodEnforced: The space enforces the duration of the voting period
create.votingPeriodExplainer: This is the time period in which users will be able to vote. The proposal will be visible and pending before the start of the voting period.
create.uploadImageExplainer: Attach images by dragging & dropping, selecting or pasting them.
create.errorGettingSnapshot: We encountered an error while fetching the snapshot block number which is needed to calculate your voting power. Please try again later.
create.errorTimeInPast: Entered time is in the past. Please select a future time.
create.errorSpaceHibernatedAdmin: Admins your attention is required. This space has been hibernated due to a lack of activity, and as a result, proposal creation is currently disabled. To re-enable your space, please go to the settings page and click "Reactivate".
create.errorSpaceHibernatedUsers: This space has been hibernated due to a lack of activity. As a result, the creation of proposals has been temporarily disabled. To resume your ability to create proposals, the space needs to be reactivated by an admin. Please check back later or contact your space admin for further information.

single-choice.label: Single choice voting
single-choice.description: Each voter may select only one choice.

approval.label: Approval voting
approval.description: Each voter may select any number of choices.

quadratic.label: Quadratic voting
quadratic.description: Each voter may spread voting power across any number of choices. Results are calculated quadratically.

ranked-choice.label: Ranked choice voting
ranked-choice.description: Each voter may select and rank any number of choices. Results are calculated by instant-runoff counting method.

weighted.label: Weighted voting
weighted.description: Each voter may spread voting power across any number of choices.

basic.label: Basic voting
basic.description: Single choice voting with three choices: For, Against or Abstain

home.title: Snapshot - Where decisions get made
home.description: Snapshot is an off-chain voting platform that allows DAOs, DeFi protocols, or NFT communities to participate in the decentralized governance easily and without gas fees.

proposals.noProposals: There aren't any proposals here yet!

postVoteModal.gnosisSafeDescription: Votes with a Safe require additional signers and will be visible once the transaction is confirmed

tips.1: Votes can be changed while the proposal is active

pendingGeneration.title: Your report is currently being generated
pendingGeneration.description: It may take a few minutes. Please check back shortly.

unsupportedEnv.title: Unsupported environment
unsupportedEnv.description: Votes report are not available on demo.

unknownError.title: We're having trouble connecting to the server responsible for downloads
unknownError.description: Please try again in a few moments. If the problem persists, consider contacting our support team.

filtersPopover.title: Filters
filtersPopover.onlyVotesWithReason: Only show votes with a reason

errors.fileTooBig: File size should be smaller than 1MB
errors.unsupportedImageType: File type not supported, Supported formats are jpeg, jpg and png
